# Government Tender Announcement
### EC015-250410 Joseph A. Ghiz (JAG) Strategic Office Optimization Design

**Service Procurement Notice**
(publié le **2024-07-08**, cloture des propositions le **2024-07-30 14:00:00**)
 
 The Department of Public Works and Government Services (DPSG), on behalf of the Canada Revenue Agency (CRA), invites qualified service providers to submit proposals for the design services for the strategic office optimization at the Joseph A. Ghiz Building (JAG) located in Summerside, Prince Edward Island.

**Background Information**
 
The CRA has a requirement for design services to optimize the layout and functionality of their offices at the JAG Building. This project aims to improve the working environment and enhance the productivity of CRA employees.

**Scope of Work**
 
The scope of work includes the design and development of a comprehensive plan to optimize the use of space, improve the workflow, and enhance the aesthetic appeal of the CRA offices. The selected service provider will be responsible for:

* Conducting a thorough assessment of the current office layout and operations
* Developing a design concept that takes into account the CRA's business needs and goals
* Creating a detailed design plan and specifications
* Providing technical support during the implementation phase

**Eligibility Criteria**
 
Only service providers who have been qualified under the Architecture and Interior Design Supply Arrangement (E0225-152290) ID2 stream for the province of Prince Edward Island are eligible to participate in this procurement.

**Proposals**
 
Proposals must be submitted in either English or French, and should include the following:

* A comprehensive design plan and specifications
* A detailed budget and project timeline
* A description of the service provider's experience and expertise in this field
* Any other relevant documentation

**Evaluation Criteria**
 
Proposals will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Technical Merit (40%)
* Price (30%)
* Price-Technical Trade-Off (30%)

**Contact Information**
 
For more information, please contact:
Nicole Fesseha, DPSG
nicole.fesseha@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

Note: As the tender has already expired, this notice is for information purposes only.
